title: ***DARRVIN CREST E-BIKE 29R***
text: E+ MTB Hardtail | Urban, Commuting, Touring, MountainSeamless integration upgrade - choose from four configurations.Simple | Sport | City | Touring.OPTIONAL EXTRA: Darrvin Clip on Fender Set, Darrvin Pannier Rack, Darrvin Trunk Bag, Side Stand, Kenda Kwick Journey Commuter Tyre 700x40c.Upgrades include an updated frame geometry with a fully integrated battery, tapered headset, adjustable air suspension fork and wider gear range. Our most versatile model yet.WARRANTY: 1 Year Motor and Battery, 5 Years FrameAVAILABILITY: South Africa (As of August 2021)MODEL YEAR: 2022FEATURESConfidence inspiring MTB frame geometry with 29’’ wheels to smooth the trail.Powerful and responsive Bafang 350W mid motor with ISIS Drive axle for added strength.Front Suspension fork with a remote lock-out.Ultra reliable BAFANG 1 x 9 drive-train with a wide gear range .Aggressive tyres fitted to extra wide rims invite you to get rowdy. With a wider bar and sport orientated components the CREST packs more options than a Swiss army knife. GENERAL NOTES ON RANGE: Predicting range depends on a number of factors: eg. someone who weighs about 70Kg, riding across varied terrain with moderate undulation and a steady cadence of 70-80 rpm can control the range through battery management using the mode settings afforded by the control system. He/She could expect to get anything between 80-120Km from a single battery charge. Visit our FAQ Page for more general Q&A’s.SPECSFRAME: DARRVIN EVO Lite Alloy 29erFRONT FORK: MOZO Mag 29er Air Lock-Out 100mmCHAIN WHEEL: Bafang D-Tech 36T	CHAIN: KMC X9 E Optimised	PEDALS: Wellgo MTB GripHEADSET: D-Tech Sealed Taper Semi IntegratedHANDLEBAR: Promax Comfort Rise 700mmHANDLEBAR STEM: Promax 60/75mm alloy		GRIP/TAPE: Darrvin Trail Touch	BRAKE SET: Darrvin Apex Hydraulic 160mmHUB SET: Darrvin Forged Alloy 32h	RIM: D-Tech Double Wall 29erSPOKE: Stainless Steel black		TIRE: Kenda Slant Six 29 x 2.25	REAR DERAILLEUR: Shimano Altus M2000 SGS 9 Speed	DERAILLEUR LEVER SET R/H: Shimano SLM 2010 Rapid Fire Plus		GEARS: Shimano HG201 11-36T 9 Speed		SADDLE: Darrvin Comfort Sport		SEAT POST: Promax Micro AdjustSEAT CLAMP: D-Tech Quick ReleaseOPTIONAL EXTRA: Darrvin Clip on Fender Set, Darrvin Pannier Rack, Darrvin Trunk Bag, Side Stand, Kenda Kwick Journey Commuter Tyre 700x40c.NOTES ON WEIGHT: A really lightweight mid-range e-bike weighs in at around 21-23Kg, provided its a standard 250watt mid-drive motor model with 300-500Wh battery. A super light carbon MTB e-bike with roughly the same motor and battery might come in at 18-20Kg. For instance a top end R 150 000 ($10 000 USD) Specialized e-bike weighs just over 20Kg. The weight is a consideration if you need to transport the bike on a rack or in the back of your vehicle, but removing the battery might save 4-5Kg already when attempting to lift the bike. Either way, at the moment there is not really a significant difference in weight between most of the available e-bikes in the market. Darrvin’s lightweight aluminum-alloy frame and compact components make for one of the lighter e-bike configurations out there in its price class and with the battery removed is an easy lift onto any bike rack.Mechanical Guarantee: All components will be in a very reasonable to new condition on pre-owned bikes. Full QC check and service undergone prior to delivery.Packaging: All bikes are securely boxed and packaged to avoid any damages in transit.Race Ready: Bikes are delivered “race ready” meaning you simply have to fit the front wheel, seat post and pedals and there you go – Riding!Trading hours: Monday to Friday 08h00 – 18h00 Saturday 08h00 to 14h00 Contact us: Tel: (021) 556 8207 or hanber@cycleteknix.co.za or WhatsApp 084 550 1353Address: 145 Blaauwberg Road, Table View, Cape Town, 7441.Website: View our website for more great specials: www.cycleteknix.co.zaItems Available: 1Address: 145 Blaauwberg Rd, Table View, Cape Town, 7441

title: (XL) Titan Pro 29er
text:
I recently completed this build and it came out quite well. I went with a 1x12 config with a Recon fork in the front. The drive train is basically new and I have also added brand new brakes (never been fitted).
You will notice that the wheels are miss matched but I do have the rear wheel to complete the set, but I replaced it as the freehub is a bit rough and I did not have the tool to service / replace it. You can have the spare wheel and have it serviced elsewhere 

More about the history of the fork:
The original lowers of the fork got damaged by the previous owner, enter LBS and they replaced the original lowers with a brand new lower whilst doing the service, however. With stock levels being what they were they used a lower for a 140mm travel fork on this 100mm one. The result is that they had to sacrifice some of the travel to make it work. The amount of travel currently sits on 86mm.

My prices are negotiable and I will work with you to get the deal done.

title: Giant Trance X Advanced E + 1  for sale
text:
Giant Trance X Advanced E+1 or sale.  Bike was bought in March of this year, so is till under guarantee.  This is the link to the bike:

https://www.giant-bicycles.com/za/trance-x-advanced-eplus-1





The bike has a full carbon frame and is stock other than the following additions:


SRAM AXS 1x12 shifting.  This was moved across from my previous bike.
Front chainring is 34 tooth
Raceface Carbon bars cut to 780mm width
Brooks B17 carved short saddle.
https://www.brooksengland.com/en_row/b17-carved-short.html

Included in the sale is the Giant EnergyPak PLUS 240Wh battery.  The battery simply clips onto the bike frame and plugs into the bike charging port.  I have added Gorilla Tape to the cable for extra protection.  I have also modified the water bottle holder plate to take two CO2 bombs.



Front tyre is the Vitorria MAZZA 29x2.6 with the trail casing
Rear tyre is the Maxxis Disector 3C EXO +, MaxTerra 29x2.6
Both tyres are in good condition.


The Fox Live fork and shock run off the bike battery so no separate batteries required.



The bike has done 1169km and has had 13 charges.

title: Children's Cycling Club
text: PINNACLE CYCLING is a cycling group for children that runs for 4 Saturdays a month. Our rides take place in the afternoons so as not to clash with school sport, however does move earlier in the holidays. Our group rides take place at common mountain biking routes such as Bisley Park, Mountain View, Hilton forests, Cascades Mountain bike park and Alex Track. We focus on outrides to build indurance as well as interval based training to build strength for the longer rides.We like to also swap some Saturdays from a ride to a hike which we found builds better team dynamics and adds to the childrens overall fitness.Pinnacle Cycling is Club with a monthly fee of R400-00 per child with a once off joining fee of R150-00 per child. The monthly fee is always paid up in advance on the 25th of every month, no later than the 26th.Upon joining, each child is required to complete 3 forms:Registration FormPayment FormPhoto Consent FormThese forms will be sent to you and need to be completed and the hard copy given at the first session.Each rider is required to have:- A Mountain bike with front shocks (not a BMX bike)- Closed shoes (Takkies or cleats)- Tube repair kit- Spare bike tube- Sunglasses for eye protection- SABS approved Helmet (No Helmet, No Ride, No Exceptions)Pinnacle Cycling also holds holiday events that are charged separately. This is where we focus a lot on team building, activities and some more on fitness and skills.

title: Rockrider 20" Red Mountain Bike for Sale
text:
Rockrider Mountain Bike 20" in excellent condition- as new. Only used a few times. Price new is R6599 

This mountain bike is designed for children who are aged 6 to 9 and looking for adventure. It's suitable for kids with heights between 120 and 135 cm.

For comfortable rides on rough terrain, we've equipped this 20" MTB with a suspension fork. Easily overcome slopes with the 6 speeds.
Our engineers have designed a new aluminium frame. Durable, lightweight and responsive: designed for tackling any obstacles when out mountain biking.

Effective braking thanks to the cable-activated disc brake at the front and a V-brake at the rear.
The disc brake acts on the wheel axle to deliver powerful braking under any conditions (dry, wet, muddy, etc.).

The V-brake is composed of 2 levers equipped with pads that exercise more or less pressure on the rim to slow or stop the rotation of the wheels.

Take on new challenging terrain (roots, stones, gravel, etc.) with ease thanks to the travel of the front suspension fork.

This bike is equipped with a grip shifter to change between the 6 speeds: an easier, safer system as the child's hands stay on the handlebars.

This makes changing gears to match the terrain simple and easy!

Because children have smaller hands than adults, it's not always easy for them to reach the brake lever. This is why our engineers designed a brake lever that is closer to the handlebars and thus easier to hold.

A saddle with a sporty design, designed with care to adapt to the morphology of children. Combined with an aluminium seat post (sturdy and flexible) for even greater comfort.

We equipped this mountain bike with a short aluminium stem (60 mm handlebar) and an oversized 520 mm handle for more controlled steering. This makes you more precise and responsive on turns.

The new aluminium chainset has a 140 mm crank that is designed for a child's leg length. This light chainset allows you to start pedalling more easily.
The double chain guard prevents the chain from derailing.

The tyres are designed for mountain biking. The lateral lugs provide good grip on turns. The tyres use SkinWall technology. This process reduces their weight and makes them more flexible, which increases performance, grip and comfort.

The recommended tyre pressure is displayed on the tyre sidewall (between 2 and 3.5 bar).

20-inch 1.7"-2.2" wide inner tube with Schrader valve.

This MTB is equipped with a bell, lighting, wheel reflectors and platform pedals.

title: 2018 Yt Tues Pro Race Carbon - XL
text: Selling my 2018 Yt Tues Carbon in XL frame size. (Sized closer to a Large)I bought this bike in April of 2021 and it was still BRAND NEW and UNOPENED from the factory in its original box and disassembled. Everything on the bike is carbon. The frame, swingarm, wheels, handlebars, cranks, derailleur, shifter even the seatpost. The bike weighs about 15.4kgs without pedals.I had about 10-12 occasions of bike park riding on it at Highland Bike Park in New Hampshire, USA. Also 1 day at Hellsend, Stellenbosch, and that's it. The bike still has its OEM signature tyres on as 'proof' of the mileage(or lack thereof)This puppy also has had a full service done by TheBikePark in Constantia Uitsig and both fork and shock has been serviced by Omnico (still have the receipts). It has not been ridden since.Included are some extras:E*thirteen valves for tubeless setupFactory ODI AG signature gripsExtra E*thirteen crank shoesODI race number boardCrank Bros. Stamp 7 pedals(with spare pins)AM Camo frame protection on top tube, shock pivot and swingarmand the owners manuals.Also have a bunch of gear to sell separately(too much to mention) I'm 184cm and just about 80kg.Price is firm, I'm in no rush to sell, I'm just doing it a great disservice by not letting it shred as it was meant to.Cheers, Marten

title: Silverback Dual Suspension 29er XL Mountain Bike for Sale
text:
BrandSilverbackModelMERCURY COMPSizeM/17.5, L/18.5, Xl/21ColorPolar Silver / Quattro Red

Fork typeRock Shox Recon Gold TK 29" 100mmFrame typeAluminumFront derailleurShimano Deore 10 SpeedHub frontShimano SLX Center lockHub rearShimano SLX Center lockPedalsShimano PD-M505Rear derailleurShimano XT Shadow 10 SpeedRims typeSTANS Crest 29 Double Wall AluminiumShiftersShimano SLX 10 Speed Rapidfire PlusShock typeFox Float RLStrong and stiff double butted 6066 Aluminium main frame provides a solid platform for IDS performance as well as increasing lateral rigidity for belter control of bicycle in extreme trail use. Rear travel increased to 110mm for optimal trail riding setup with 30-35% sag. This creates a comfortable ride that in combination with the larger wheels and the IDS, enhances the rider’s momentum through large rock garden trails and hard hits. SB Exclusive IDS dual suspension technology. SBC oversized lightweight components used to enforce design concept and bring refined quality to user’s control points. Cable hose guides for derailleur enable continuous sealed shifter housing for extended protection against the elements. Increased BB height with correct suspension setup enables god pedal clearance as well as allowing balanced cornering when descending. Wide low -riser bars increase rider comfort, control and leverage over big wheels in extreme terrain while keeping the setup at a decent height for climbing. Tapered head tube 1 1/8” to 1.5” for increased front end stiffness aids steering accuracy. Steepened head angle in con junction with increased sag on rear suspension setup gives bike a perfect xc/trail setup for balanced handling response and control. Front rotors increased to 180mm for belter braking power and minimal weight gain. Each (price point or model) uses as light a wheel as possible to maximise the 29’er ride experience. Rockshox Air forks 100mm.

title: Scott Gambler 30 downhill bike
text:
Hi there I am selling my Scott Gambler 30 downhill bike.

The bike is in good condition with many extras.

It has 5 spare brake disc's
1 spare handle bar
